sources.name: test_table
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  test_table

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared test_table = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("glebs-server.database.windows.net", "glebs-database", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "testing", Item = "random_data"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = test_table,
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(Source, "Gender", each if [order] = 1 then "female" else "male"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Added custom", {{"Gender", type text}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
